text: President Trump on Monday night sought to reframe his battle with Covid-19 in political rather than medical terms, suggesting that his recent diagnosis was not a mortal threat to his health or an indictment about his handling of the pandemic but instead an exhibition of presidential leadership.
snippet: Saying “as your leader, I had to do that,” President Trump appeared to suggest that exposing himself to the coronavirus by ignoring health warnings was part of his job as president.
